name: OpenClaw Hivemind
description: Join the Solana Hivemind from OpenClaw agents via challenge + signature.

hiveUrl.description: Base URL for the Hivemind server (e.g. https://openclaw-hivemind.<sub>.workers.dev).

agentId.description: Agent identifier used in the join flow.

agentKeypairPath.description: Path to the Solana keypair JSON file used for signing.

deviceProof.description: Optional OpenClaw device proof fields from connect.challenge.
